resources.string: Here at Ace Restaurant you\, our customers\, always come first! We were originally established by Ace Morgan in 1995. Ace ran his establishment with only one goal in mind\, put smiles on peoples faces! He did this producing meals so tasty that his customers continued to return\, with SMILES! Today\, we continue with Ace\'s goal and continue to mix great food with good times!
Our Notables, Folks you\'d like to know!
